function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rejectionists viewing the pandemic as a hoax due to pre-conceived notions about the government or media","Impact":"Underestimation of the threat of the coronavirus and reluctance to take necessary precautions","Mitigation":"Provide accurate and reliable information through trusted sources to counter misinformation","Technologies":"Social media monitoring and fact-checking tools","People":"Rejectionist consumers","Owner":"Public health authorities and credible news organizations"},{"Description":"Influence of marketers on how Survivalists and Rejectionists perceive information about the pandemic","Impact":"Potential distortion of information and reinforcement of biased perspectives","Mitigation":"Regulate marketing communications to ensure accuracy and objectivity","Technologies":"Data analytics for monitoring and evaluating marketing messages","People":"Survivalists and Rejectionists","Owner":"Regulatory bodies and industry watchdogs"},{"Description":"Different message strategies aimed at promotion-vs. prevention-focused consumers","Impact":"Varying levels of response to public health guidance and messaging","Mitigation":"Tailor messaging to appeal to different motivational mindsets and emphasize common goals","Technologies":"Behavioral analytics and targeted messaging platforms","People":"Prevention-focused and promotion-focused consumers","Owner":"Public health agencies and marketing professionals"}]}
